dc.title: Thorium Reader for Desktop User Guide (3.4)
dc.creator: The European Digital Reading Lab
dc.description: Official Thorium Reader for Desktop 3.4 documentation. Comprehensive guidance for getting to know and using Thorium Reader effectively. Additional support resources are available online at thorium.edrlab.org.
